body_html:
Same issue when building CPU only config.

Command:
bazel build --config=opt //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package

Error:
WARNING: /Users/betterchen/Documents/build_source/tensorflow/tensorflow/core/BUILD:1772:1: in includes attribute of cc_library rule //tensorflow/core:framework_headers_lib: '../../external/nsync/public' resolves to 'external/nsync/public' not below the relative path of its package 'tensorflow/core'. This will be an error in the future. Since this rule was created by the macro 'cc_header_only_library', the error might have been caused by the macro implementation in /Users/betterchen/Documents/build_source/tensorflow/tensorflow/tensorflow.bzl:1029:30.
WARNING: /Users/betterchen/Documents/build_source/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/learn/BUILD:15:1: in py_library rule //tensorflow/contrib/learn:learn: target '//tensorflow/contrib/learn:learn' depends on deprecated target '//tensorflow/contrib/session_bundle:exporter': No longer supported. Switch to SavedModel immediately.
WARNING: /Users/betterchen/Documents/build_source/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/learn/BUILD:15:1: in py_library rule //tensorflow/contrib/learn:learn: target '//tensorflow/contrib/learn:learn' depends on deprecated target '//tensorflow/contrib/session_bundle:gc': No longer supported. Switch to SavedModel immediately.
INFO: Found 1 target...
ERROR: /private/var/tmp/_bazel_betterchen/0097c5c262e7669ec35d623703e38a90/external/nsync/BUILD:397:1: C++ compilation of rule '@nsync//:nsync_cpp' failed (Exit 1).
In file included from external/nsync/internal/dll.c:16:
In file included from ./external/nsync//platform/c++11/platform.h:29:
In file included from /Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/usr/include/c++/v1/mutex:189:
In file included from /Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/usr/include/c++/v1/__mutex_base:17:
/Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/usr/include/c++/v1/__threading_support:156:1: error: unknown type name 'mach_port_t'
mach_port_t __libcpp_thread_get_port();
^
/Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/usr/include/c++/v1/__threading_support:300:1: error: unknown type name 'mach_port_t'
mach_port_t __libcpp_thread_get_port() {
^
/Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/usr/include/c++/v1/__threading_support:301:12: error: use of undeclared identifier 'pthread_mach_thread_np'
return pthread_mach_thread_np(pthread_self());
^
3 errors generated.
Target //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package failed to build
Use --verbose_failures to see the command lines of failed build steps.
INFO: Elapsed time: 26.368s, Critical Path: 0.54s
